Module entities
Package controls

Interface Notification

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Email
    public interface Notification
    A notification interface that contains methods to send different types of messages depending on the use case. Different types of notifications can be added to the interface to expand the use cases.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean sendDropCourseMessage​(java.lang.String studID, java.lang.String courseID, java.lang.String courseName)
      sendDropCourseMessage() is used to send a notification to a student when the student drops a course that he/she is registered to.
      boolean sendEnrolledCourseListMessage​(java.lang.String studID, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> courseList)
      sendEnrolledCourseListMessage() is used to send the student a message containing all the courses that he/she is registered to.
      boolean sendRegisterSuccessfulMessage​(java.lang.String studID, java.lang.String courseID, java.lang.String courseName)
      sendRegisterSuccessfulMessage() is used to send a notification to the student in case of successfully registration to a course.
      boolean sendWaitListedMessage​(java.lang.String studID, java.lang.String courseID, java.lang.String courseName)
      sendWaitListedMessage() is used to send a notification to a student in the case that the student is added to a waitlist of a course.

    • Method Detail

      • sendRegisterSuccessfulMessage

        boolean sendRegisterSuccessfulMessage​(java.lang.String studID,
                                      java.lang.String courseID,
                                      java.lang.String courseName)
        sendRegisterSuccessfulMessage() is used to send a notification to the student in case of successfully registration to a course.
        Parameters:
        studID - : String, the ID of the user to whom the message needs to be sent.
        courseID - : String, the ID of the course the student has been registered to.
        courseName - : String, the name of the course the student has been registered to
        Returns:
        true, if the email was sent successfully. false, if the email failed to send.

      • sendWaitListedMessage

        boolean sendWaitListedMessage​(java.lang.String studID,
                              java.lang.String courseID,
                              java.lang.String courseName)
        sendWaitListedMessage() is used to send a notification to a student in the case that the student is added to a waitlist of a course.
        Parameters:
        studID - : String, the ID of the user to whom the message needs to be sent.
        courseID - : String, the ID of the course the student has been waitlisted to.
        courseName - : String, the name of the course the student has been waitlisted to.
        Returns:
        true, if the email was sent successfully. false, if the email failed to send.

      • sendDropCourseMessage

        boolean sendDropCourseMessage​(java.lang.String studID,
                              java.lang.String courseID,
                              java.lang.String courseName)
        sendDropCourseMessage() is used to send a notification to a student when the student drops a course that he/she is registered to.
        Parameters:
        studID - : String, the ID of the user to whom the message needs to be sent.
        courseID - : String, the ID of the course the student has dropped.
        courseName - : String, the name of the course the student has dropped.
        Returns:
        true, if the email was sent successfully. false, if the email failed to send.

      • sendEnrolledCourseListMessage

        boolean sendEnrolledCourseListMessage​(java.lang.String studID,
                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> courseList)
        sendEnrolledCourseListMessage() is used to send the student a message containing all the courses that he/she is registered to.
        Parameters:
        studID - : String, the ID of the user to whom the message needs to be sent.
        courseList - : HashMap(String, String), a list of courseID's as a key, and the courseName as a value, to which the student is registered.
        Returns:
        true, if the email was sent successfully. false, if the email failed to send.
